entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:49 p.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:39 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow or rain beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:39 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount possibly more than 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:39 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
